summary: OCLC Online Computer Library Center, Inc.
full_text:
The Online Computer Library Center, Inc.  is "a nonprofit, membership, computer library service and research organization dedicated to the public purposes of furthering access to the world's information and reducing information costs". Founded in 1967 as the Ohio College Library Center, OCLC and its member libraries cooperatively produce and maintain WorldCat, the largest online public access catalog  in the world.
^ "Cooperation". OCLC. Retrieved 2010-03-18. 
^ "About OCLC". OCLC. Retrieved 2010-03-18.
title: Online Computer Library Center
